reference: 1. Betancourt, Roger and Harry Kelejian. Lagged Endogenous Variables and the Cochrane-Orcutt Procedure. Econometrica 49 (July 1981); 1073-1078.

6. Frenkel, Jacob A. Flexible Exchange Rates, Prices, and the Role of `News: 665-705.
